turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I was wondering if you could help me order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three pizzas, all of them small. I want one meat lovers, and two plain cheese. And if you could make the two cheeses gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the total for 3 small pizzas, 1 meat lovers and 2 cheese pizzas with gluten free crust is $32.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order, it'll be ready in 35 mins for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need assistance with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all I needed. Thank you.
